summary: June 25 is the 176th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Gustave Charpentier  was a French composer, best known for his opera Louise.
^ Langham Smith R., "Gustave Charpentier", The New Grove Dictionary of Opera. Macmillan, London and New York, 1997.
title: Gustave Charpentier
